mapper.select:
select a.id as id,a.title as title,unix_timestamp(a.start_time)*1000 as startTime ,unix_timestamp(a.end_time)*1000 as endTime,a.status as status,a.img_base_path as imgBasePath,a.operation as operation,a.targetid as targetid, a.redirect_url as redirectUrl from advimage a where
a.status=1 and a.start_time <= now() and a.end_time>=now()
